Key Match Events: Klay Thompson contributed seven points, two rebounds and one assist in 16 minutes.
Thompson's last basket made it 61-59 before Tyrese Haliburton's layup pushed Indiana's lead to four points at halftime.
Thompson scored back-to-back 3-pointers and dished an assist to Naji Marshall to tie the game at 67 apiece.
Thompson had a crucial pass that led to a Luka Doncic triple.
The Dallas Mavericks lost 134-127 to the Indiana Pacers.
